rules.description: All application code lives under the src directory and must use TypeScript (no JavaScript files).
Use Mongoose for MongoDB access. Define schemas in src/models, manage connections through src/config/database.ts, and keep database connection strings in the MONGO_URI environment variable.
All API request validation must use Zod schemas placed in src/validations, wired through the validate middleware. express-validator is not permitted.
JWT authentication relies on helpers in src/utils (generateToken, verifyToken, hashPassword, comparePassword). Password hashes must be stored in the Laravel compatible $2y$ format.
All user-facing strings must come from the locale JSON files (src/locales). Support en and hi languages, default locale is controlled by DEFAULT_LOCALE and the locale middleware.
Swagger documentation lives in src/config/swagger.ts and every new route must include Swagger annotations.
Express routes are mounted under /api/v1 and follow the existing middleware pipeline (cors, body parsing, locale middleware, routes, error handlers).
Create a Md file for each new feature and add the rules for that feature in that Md file. /docs folder.
create academy auth routes in src/routes/academyAuth.routes.ts.
